title: Investigate and fix Opt-Prof tests and test scenarios.
body:
We would like to investigate Opt-Prof tests and fix them.  It seems that some of the Opt-Prof tests/test scenarios are outdated: those tests runs on 32 version of MSBuild. This might have some impact on Opt-Prof efficiency (see #8103). 

Exit criteria: 
1. The 32 bit tests fixed to use 64 bit msbuild.
2. Other opt-prof scenarios are reviewed and updated if needed (time-boxed 1 day).

nodes.body: Status: I finished to review the existing opt-prof scenarios, I have the draft PR with fixes.
Let's clarify impact of opt-prof before continuing with this issue further.
